author: Will Chamberlain
title: Trump’s Plan to Reopen the Economy is the Right One
description: Leaving the decision to governors is correct -- and his team has provided solid guidelines to protect public health. The post Trump’s Plan to Reopen the Economy is the Right One appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Leaving the decision to governors is correct -- and his team has provided solid guidelines to protect public health.Like so many of President Trumps most audacious claims, his bluster that he had total authority to re-open the economy was merely an opening bi… [+4420 chars]
